item.title: 通胀成本导致联合租赁公司利润不及预期
item.description: 联合租赁公司（United Rentals）是一家向北美制造业和建筑业出租设备的公司，受通货膨胀成本的影响，该公司周三公布的第四季度利润低于分析师的预期。【原文：United Rentals , which rents out equipment to the manufacturing and construction sectors across North America, missed analysts' estimate for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, hit by inflationary costs.】

item.title: 以色列网络公司称敏感的 DeepSeek 数据已暴露在网络上
item.description: 以色列网络安全公司 Wiz 表示，它发现了中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 无意中暴露在开放互联网上的敏感数据。【原文：Israeli cybersecurity firm Wiz says it has found a trove of sensitive data from the Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek inadvertently exposed to the open internet.】

item.title: 鲍威尔表示，美联储的指导原则是经济目标和法律，而不是政治
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三在回答有关特朗普政府对美国央行的影响的一系列问题时表示，政治并没有促使美联储决定退出一个以气候为重点的全球小组，也不会影响美联储的利率决议。【原文：Fielding a range of questions about the imprint of the Trump administration on the U.S. central bank, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday said that politics had not prompted the Fed's decision to leave a global climate-focused group, and would not affect its interest-rate calls.】

item.title: Ameriprise Financial 季度利润增长，原因是市场反弹提高了手续费收入
item.description: Ameriprise Financial 周三公布，由于市场反弹导致客户资产价值增加，手续费收入增加，公司第四季度利润增长 24%。【原文：Ameriprise Financial reported a 24% rise in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by a higher fee income as the value of its clients' assets increased due to a market rally.】

item.title: 早间竞价：科技股、鹰派美联储在大盘股盈利游行前给股市施压
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 澳门业务疲软，拉斯维加斯金沙利润不及预期
item.description: 受澳门业务表现不佳的影响，赌场运营商拉斯维加斯金沙周三公布的第四季度利润低于分析师预期。【原文：Casino operator Las Vegas Sands missed analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by tepid performance of its Macao business.】

item.title: Juul 赢得禁止美国进口 Altria 吸烟设备的命令
item.description: 周三，在一场电子烟技术专利纠纷中，美国贸易法庭支持 Juul Labs，下令禁止进口 Altria 旗下 NJOY 公司生产的电子烟设备和烟弹，其中至少有一部分是在中国和马来西亚生产的。【原文：A U.S. trade tribunal sided with Juul Labs on Wednesday and ordered a ban on imports of vaping devices and cartridges made by Altria's NJOY - at least some of which are made in China and Malaysia - in a patent dispute over e-cigarette technology.】

item.title: 随着业务转型的推进，Wolfspeed 公司第二季度收入超预期
item.description: 芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 周三公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，净亏损小于预期，该公司进行了运营改革，以加快盈利速度。【原文：Chipmaker Wolfspeed topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue and reported a smaller-than-expected net loss on Wednesday, as the company made operational changes to accelerate its profitability.】

item.title: 由于削减成本，CH Robinson 第四季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受惠于成本削减以及海运和空运需求强劲，全球货运代理公司 CH Robinson 周三公布的第四季度利润超出分析师预期。【原文：Global freight forwarder CH Robinson's fourth-quarter profit beat analysts' estimates on Wednesday, aided by cost cuts and strong demand in ocean and air shipment.】

item.title: 本田将俄亥俄州三家汽车厂的投资额提高 3 亿美元
item.description: 本田汽车公司周三表示，将把俄亥俄州三家汽车厂的投资额提高 3 亿美元，以便灵活地在同一条装配线上生产电动车、混合动力车和汽油车。【原文：Honda Motor said on Wednesday it will boost its investments in three Ohio auto plants by $300 million to have flexibility to build EVs, hybrids and gas-powered vehicles on the same assembly line.】

item.title: Meta 预计第一季度收入低于预期
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周三预测第一季度营收低于华尔街预期，这表明该公司押注于价格昂贵的人工智能工具，但却难以为其社交媒体平台吸引更多的数字广告资金。【原文：Meta Platforms forecast first-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling its bets on pricey artificial intelligence-powered tools were struggling to attract additional digital ad dollars to its social media platforms.】

item.title: 需求疲软，西部数据预计第三季度营收低于预期
item.description: 数据存储产品制造商西部数据公司（Western Digital Corp）周三预测第三季度营收低于华尔街预期，因为该公司预计云计算和企业客户的需求将减少。【原文：Data storage products maker Western Digital Corp forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as it expects decreased demand from cloud and corporate customers.】

item.title: Venture Global LNG 几乎完成了对卡尔卡西亚帕斯发电厂的维修 -FERC
item.description: 一份联邦检查报告周三称，Venture Global 液化天然气公司可能在二月底前完成发电机维修，这可能为卡尔卡西厄通道液化天然气工厂近三年的试运行扫清障碍。【原文：Venture Global LNG could finish power generator repairs by the end of February, a federal inspection report said on Wednesday, potentially clearing the way for the almost three-year commissioning of the Calcasieu Pass LNG plant to reach completion.】

item.title: 收入超预期后，李维斯年度利润预期受挫；股价下跌
item.description: Levi Strauss 周三公布的第四季度营收高于预期，但预计全年利润远低于分析师预期，股价盘中下跌 5%。【原文：Levi Strauss forecast annual profit well below analysts' estimates after topping fourth-quarter revenue on Wednesday, sending its shares down 5% in extended trade.】

item.title: 软件业务大增，IBM 利润超预期，股价上涨
item.description: 周三，IBM 第四季度利润超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于其高利润率的软件部门因企业增加 IT 支出而产生的需求，从而使其股价在延时交易中飙升了约 10%。【原文：IBM surpassed analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by demand in its high-margin software unit as businesses ramped up IT spending, sending its shares soaring about 10% in extended trading.】

item.title: 特斯拉第四季度利润率低于预期
item.description: 本周三，特斯拉的季度业绩未能达到华尔街的目标，原因是融资优惠和折扣未能刺激对老旧车系的需求，反而侵蚀了利润。【原文：Tesla quarterly results fell short of Wall Street targets on Wednesday as financing offers and discounts failed to boost demand for the aging lineup but eroded profit.】

item.title: 微软股价下跌，原因是云计算增长不及预期，但支出增长
item.description: 微软公司周三报告称，尽管其重要的 Azure 云计算业务季度总体营收超出预期，但增长速度低于预期，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌 4%。【原文：Microsoft reported slower-than-expected growth in its crucial Azure cloud business on Wednesday despite beating estimates for overall quarterly revenue, sending its shares down 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 微软在 Azure 上推出 DeepSeek 人工智能模型
item.description: 微软公司周三表示，中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的 R1 人工智能模型已经可以在其 Azure 云计算平台和面向开发者的 GitHub 工具上使用。【原文：Microsoft has made Chinese startup DeepSeek's R1 artificial intelligence model available on its Azure cloud computing platform and GitHub tool for developers, the U.S. company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: LVMH 集团着眼于美国车间的扩张，但任何转变都可能是有限的
item.description: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）首席执行官贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）引发了一场关于法国商业吸引力的讨论。【原文：LVMH chief executive Bernard Arnault has sparked a debate over France's attractivity for business.】

item.title: 聚焦：为何难以阻止中国 DeepSeek 使用美国人工智能
item.description: 白宫高级顾问本周对中国的 DeepSeek 可能得益于一种方法表示震惊，这种方法被称为 "蒸馏法"，据称可以捎带美国竞争对手的进步。【原文：Top White House advisers this week expressed alarm that China's DeepSeek may have benefited from a method that allegedly piggybacks off the advances of U.S. rivals called "distillation."】

item.title: VIEW 美联储按兵不动，偏向鹰派，未提及通胀进展
item.description: 美联储周三将利率维持在4.25%至4.50%的目标区间，并对在通胀仍高于目标、经济持续增长、失业率较低的经济环境下何时可能进一步放宽政策未作深入探讨。【原文：The Federal Reserve left interest rates in the 4.25% to 4.50% target range on Wednesday and gave little insight into when further easing may take place in an economy where inflation remains above target, growth continues, and the unemployment rate is low.】

item.title: 彭博社报道：特朗普官员正在讨论加强对英伟达在华销售的限制
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府正在考虑加强对人工智能领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）销售其专为中国市场设计的H20芯片的限制。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration is considering tightening restrictions on artificial intelligence leader Nvidia's sales of its H20 chips designed for the China market, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，雷诺寻求在本田合并案中实现日产股份价值最大化
item.description: 一位接近此事的消息人士告诉路透社，雷诺高管本周前往日本与日产汽车公司的同行会面，试图在日产与本田合并之前，最大限度地提高这家法国汽车制造商所持日本公司股份的价值。【原文：Renault executives travelled to Japan this week to meet counterparts at Nissan in an effort to maximise the value of the French automaker's stake in the Japanese firm ahead of its merger with Honda, a source close to the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 加拿大部长表示美国的任何关税回应都不会单独针对阿尔伯塔省
item.description: 加拿大能源和自然资源部长乔纳森-威尔金森（Jonathan Wilkinson）周三表示，加拿大对美国关税的任何回应都将是地区性的公平和公正，而不会单独针对加拿大的主要产油省阿尔伯塔省。【原文：Any Canadian response to U.S. tariffs will be regionally fair and equitable and not single out Alberta, Canada's main oil-producing province, Canada's Energy and Natural Resources Minister Jonathan Wilkinson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 将在 10 多个新城市测试自动驾驶技术
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周三宣布，它计划在 2025 年在 10 多个新城市扩大自动驾驶技术的测试范围。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit Waymo announced on Wednesday it plans to expand testing of its autonomous driving technology in over 10 new cities in 2025.】

item.title: 米兰市长站在 Mediobanca 一边，称 MPS 的出价与罗马-米兰相匹配
item.description: 米兰市长朱塞佩-萨拉（Giuseppe Sala）周三在国家支持的锡耶纳蒙蒂帕斯基银行（MPS）发起的收购战中站在了 Mediobanca 一边，这标志着这场金融风波正变得越来越政治化。【原文：Milan mayor Giuseppe Sala on Wednesday sided with Mediobanca in a takeover battle launched by state-backed Monte dei Paschi di Siena (MPS), signalling the financial saga was becoming increasingly political.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的全球成功让中国人感到自豪和欣喜
item.description: 中国博客、国家媒体和当地民众对 DeepSeek 在全球取得的成功感到自豪和欣喜，一些人认为，这家本土人工智能初创公司的飞速崛起表明，中国正在击退华盛顿遏制中国科技产业的企图。【原文：Chinese bloggers, state media and local citizens have welcomed DeepSeek's global success with pride and glee, with some saying the homegrown AI startup's meteoric rise is a sign China is beating back Washington's attempts to contain the country's tech industry.】

item.title: 新报告旨在扭转国际能源署对能源转型的关注
item.description: 根据国际能源机构前石油主管周三发布的一份报告，该机构需要改革其撰写年度能源展望的方式，以反映真实世界的情景，而不是加强其目前对全球能源转型的关注。【原文：The International Energy Agency needs to revamp how it writes its annual energy outlook to reflect real-world scenarios, not to bolster its current focus on the global energy transition, according to a report released on Wednesday by the agency's former oil director.】

item.title: 宾夕法尼亚州州长与 PJM 就容量支付达成协议
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州州长乔希-夏皮罗（Josh Shapiro）周二表示，他已与电网运营商 PJM Interconnection 达成协议，解决他最近对其电力市场规则的投诉，并在两年内为消费者节省超过 210 亿美元的能源成本。【原文：Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro on Tuesday said he has reached an agreement with grid operator PJM Interconnection to settle his recent complaint about its power market rules and save consumers over $21 billion in energy costs over two years.】

item.title: 诉讼指控亚马逊通过手机秘密跟踪消费者
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三遭到消费者起诉，他们指控这家零售巨头通过手机秘密跟踪他们的行踪，并出售收集到的数据。【原文：Amazon.com was sued on Wednesday by consumers who accused the retailing giant of secretly tracking their movements through their cellphones, and selling data it collects.】
